system.description:
Effect: All valid targets gain @Affliction[fear] 5.

The user may spend up to 6 additional PP, increasing the Power of this attack by 15 per PP spent.

Requirement: User is a Dynamaxed Gengar and has a Ghost-Type attack on their Active List.
